The Oilers got behind early and failed to find a way to comeback, as valiant as their effort was. The Grade

articles.title: WestJet wheelchair weight limit frustrates passengers, advocates
articles.description: Advocates say a policy by WestJet capping the weight of mobility aids like power wheelchairs at 300 pounds is unfair and potentially unlawful.

articles.description: Meadow Lake Tribal Council calls for First Nations-led policing following public safety concerns after a rise in violence, gang activity, drugs, and emergency response delays.

articles.description: Captain Adam Lowry avoided free agency next summer by signing a five-year contract extension with the Winnipeg Jets.

articles.description: Toronto police say a second victim has been connected to a 46-year-old man, originally wanted for allegedly assaulting and harassing someone over nine months earlier this year. articles.title: Lethbridge charity prepares for the future with new location
articles.description: Streets Alive Mission has supported the homeless in southern Alberta for over 30 years. Now, they are relocating to better serve those in need.
